TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content:
> 
> He he, I know your name now. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

I know, that's the only problem. I might make another account, but it's only my first name.

> 
> It's a lovely name. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks, however I have changed my google account name. Nothing personal, I just don't want anyone to be able to see it, especially spambots or stuff like that. Or maybe it didn't work, google accounts seem to be absurdly strange.
Unfortunately, Majorjim will not be able to do SCF on Friday, instead, s/he should be able to do it on Saturday afternoon.

> 
> Unfortunately, Majorjim will not be able to do SCF on Friday, instead, s/he should be able to do it on Saturday afternoon.

Whoop another Saturday ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I mean this in a good way not a bad way in case someone misinterpreted this.

Unfortunately, it seems that majorjim cannot do it at all this weekend, so YargJay9991 will be doing it this week. Sorry for the late update, it's fine if you're only able to do it on Saturday or Sunday.
Well, whoever does it, make sure you've seen my U-boat. I'm proud of that magnificent beast.

> 
> Well, whoever does it, make sure you've seen my U-boat. I'm proud of that magnificent beast.

If it was doing it, I probably would pick it.

- - - Updated - - -

Oh, and from now on, if there's no word from the next maintainer, I'll PM them.

Majorjim! Tomorrow is your SCF. I will send you a PM in a bit if I don't hear anything from you in a bit. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I can try and do one if you like MRS. I'll see if it fits in.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991
